DataElement.preferredName: Metastatic Diagnosis Esophageal Neoplasm Risk Factor History Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An individual's attribute, characteristic or exposure that increases the likelihood of developing metastatic disease involving the esophagus.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any diagnosis indicating the presence of metastatic disease._A record of an individual's attribute, characteristic or exposure that increases the likelihood of developing a disease or injury. (WHO)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any diagnosis indicating the presence of metastatic disease.

Concepts.definition: Any diagnosis indicating the presence of metastatic disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: A record of an individual's attribute, characteristic or exposure that increases the likelihood of developing a disease or injury. (WHO)

Concepts.definition: A record of an individual's attribute, characteristic or exposure that increases the likelihood of developing a disease or injury. (WHO)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Esophageal Neoplasm Risk Factor History Category
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A benign or malignant neoplasm involving the esophagus._A record of an individual's attribute, characteristic or exposure that increases the likelihood of developing a disease or injury. (WHO)_A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

PermissibleValues.value: Family History of Esophageal or Gastric Esophageal Cancer in First Degree Relative
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: First Degree Family History of Esophageal or Gastric Esophageal Cancer

ValueMeaning.preferredName: First Degree Family History of Esophageal or Gastric Esophageal Cancer
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Parents, siblings or children of an individual have a history of esophageal or gastric esophageal cancer.

Concepts.longName: First Degree Family History of Esophageal or Gastric Esophageal Cancer
Concepts.definition: Parents, siblings or children of an individual have a history of esophageal or gastric esophageal cancer.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Barrett Esophagus With Metaplastic Goblet Cell Columnar Epithelium

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Barrett Esophagus With Metaplastic Goblet Cell Columnar Epithelium
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding in an esophageal biopsy specimen indicating the diagnosis of Barrett esophagus associated with the presence of metaplastic columnar epithelium containing goblet cells.

Concepts.longName: Barrett Esophagus With Metaplastic Goblet Cell Columnar Epithelium
Concepts.definition: A finding in an esophageal biopsy specimen indicating the diagnosis of Barrett esophagus associated with the presence of metaplastic columnar epithelium containing goblet cells.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Barrett Esophagus With Metaplastic Non-Goblet Cell Columnar Epithelium

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Barrett Esophagus With Metaplastic Non-Goblet Cell Columnar Epithelium
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding in an esophageal biopsy specimen indicating the diagnosis of Barrett esophagus associated with the presence of metaplastic non-goblet cell columnar epithelium.

Concepts.longName: Barrett Esophagus With Metaplastic Non-Goblet Cell Columnar Epithelium
Concepts.definition: A finding in an esophageal biopsy specimen indicating the diagnosis of Barrett esophagus associated with the presence of metaplastic non-goblet cell columnar epithelium.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A bacterial infection of the stomach, caused by Helicobacter pylori.  It is associated with the development of peptic ulcer and mucosa-associated lymphoid tissue lymphoma.

Concepts.definition: A bacterial infection of the stomach, caused by Helicobacter pylori.  It is associated with the development of peptic ulcer and mucosa-associated lymphoid tissue lymphoma.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual has been clinically diagnosed with gastric reflux disease.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual has been clinically diagnosed with gastric reflux disease.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
